subtitles:
54796 57674 - You ready?
- Yeah. Boot it.
57716 59947 (Garbled chatter)

61436 64587 That's it. That's it. Excellent.
I'm recording.

64637 67787 You crazy? Wait till
I get this thing down.

67837 71671 - What the fuck you doing?
- God damn, you stupid pussy.

71716 74549 - Fuck!
- Don't call me a pussy.

74596 77236 - I'll fucking ID you!
- Take the gun.

77277 82271 You're giving me this piece of shit?
Is it even loaded? I want the auto.
84356 87793 Whoo! I love this shit, man!

87837 90670 - Don't fuckin'...
- Fuck you!

92557 96311 - Right there. Turn left. Turn right.
- (Driver) OK, OK, just relax.
98397 100751 Here we go. There it is.

101917 105272 - Easy. Take it easy.
- Don't make a fuckin' noise.
111236 113227 (Shouting and gunfire)
113837 117625 Go, go, go! Down! Down, you fucker!
117716 119707 I said down!

122037 125028 This is a robbery!
Everyone put your hands up!
125076 127465 Hands in the air! Hands in the air!

127516 131669 No, no, no, no, no.
Where you going, bitch? Over here!

131717 135596 - Get the fuckin' money!
- You! Open the fuckin' register!

135637 138151 You want to fuckin' die,
you little fuck?
138197 139914 Please! Please, don't shoot!
139956 142629 (All shouting, video camera crackles)

144717 147753 - Don't shoot us. Don't shoot.
- Come on! This way!
150997 153510 Run, man, run! Run, man!

153556 157835 (2nd robber) Go, go, go, go, go!
Don't look at me, you fuckin' chink!

157877 161391 - Get in there!
- Get him inside!

163956 166516 - You get the money?
- (All) Yes!

166556 170105 - What are you doing, you asshole?
- Come on, we gotta go!

170157 172670 You get the money?
How much? How much?

172717 175709 - (Sirens)
- It's the police!
175757 179067 Fuck! I'm going. I'm going.

179116 182905 Um...fuck. Here. Come on, come on,
follow me, man.
186157 188352 Go, man, go! Come on...
188396 190671 The fucking doors are locked!
190717 193514 Come on! Come on!
193556 195673 Where are the cops, man?

195717 197673 - (Gunshot)
- Fuck you!

197717 200675 - What are you doing, man?
- Go, man! Just go!

200717 203105 - Shit!
- (Gunshots)

207437 212465 - (Cop) Drop your weapon!
- Come on! They're right behind us!

214717 216991 - Come on! Come on!
- Oh, shit!

217037 219675 - Go, man!
- Come on. Let's go.
225917 228908 Come on! Come on, jump!

228956 232949 - This is insane, man.
- (Cop) You! Stop, asshole!
236477 238671 Come on, grab my hand!
238717 241072 I'm gonna die! I'm gonna die!

241116 243187 - You motherfucker!
- (Gunshot)

246396 248786 God damn it!
You know I don't deal in snuff!
248836 251145 Don't have a fucking coronary, man.

251197 255189 I hate the zap when they die.
It just brings down your whole day.

255236 257353 - Jesus, Tick.
- Sorry(!)

257396 260149 How come the cops didn't put
that tape into evidence?

260197 263233 With all the blood,
they didn't see the rig.

263276 266906 - How'd it get to you?
- I got ways, Lenny.

266956 271029 Some of the paramedics - my guy pages
me and I picked it up at the morgue.

271076 274672 What do you think? This clip's
got to be worth a grand, right?

274716 279312 Tick, not to dash your hopes, but
I don't deal this kind of product.

279357 283235 I'll give you four. I gotta cut the
last part. My customers want uncut.
283276 285507 Fuck that. The last part's the best.

285557 288708 Dry dive six stories and blammo!
Jacked into the big black.
288757 291031 I don't deal black-jack clips!
291076 293432 It's policy. I got ethics here.

293476 297550 Oh, yeah? When did that start?
Lenny, this is what people wanna see.

297596 300269 - So lay it off to somebody else.
- Lenny, Lenny...

300317 303548 I gotta get my rig fixed,
there's blood all over the heads.

303596 306668 - Get away.
- Gimme six, it's a good clip.
306716 308708 It gets you pumpin'.
308757 310747 The first part's OK.
310797 313026 It's better than your usual soaps.

313076 315875 Now, that is cold.
I always bring you choice.

315916 320115 Sure, like this low-grade shit here?
Some girl fighting her boyfriend.
320156 322148 Nothing happens. I'm snoring.
322197 324312 Lenny, you're always telling me,
324357 326427 bring you street life, real life,

326476 330675 that one man's desperate existence
is another man's Technicolor.

330716 333675 - I said that?
- Many times. That's a direct quote.

333716 336355 I'll take it for five.
You'll make out OK.

336396 339274 It's pure cream.
No cutback to the wearer.

339317 343196 - Yeah, that's for sure. OK.
- What else you got?

351516 354634 # Think you can remember
what you said to me

354677 357555 # You say anything
that's from the six... #

357596 359588 (Radio) 'Calls are a little kooky
tonight.

359637 362514 'It's a little after 2am,
December 30, 1999.
362557 364593 'Second to last day of the century.'

364637 368516 Jer, hi. I'll drop the money
by tomorrow, next day latest.

368557 372310 Little crazy right now.
Would I lie? No. Never to you, Jer.
372357 374824 You're not wrong. You're not wrong.
376396 378387 (Opera music)

384997 389274 - (Radio) 'Excited about New Year?'
- 'Not really. What's the point?
389317 391307 'Nothing changes New Year's Day.

391357 395350 'The economy sucks.
Gas is over three bucks a gallon.

395396 398230 '5th grade kids are shooting
each other at recess.

398276 401747 'The whole thing sucks.
What the hell are we celebrating?'
401797 404310 (# Heavy metal)
405476 408274 (Choir) # Amen, amen, amen
410877 413834 # Amen, amen, amen

417197 420632 Get me the clip by Monday.
Client wants a guy and two girls.

420677 424146 The guy wears... I know.
He's trying to be original.
424197 426312 And the girls have to be young.

426357 429872 Don't use your mother like usual.
Yeah, you, too, asshole.
429916 431952 (Radio) 'Caller, you're on the air.'

431997 435591 (Caller) 'My name's Dewayne.
I got a resolution for the police.'

435637 438026 '5-0, you better get down
with the 2K.'

438076 441591 - (DJ) '2K, Dewayne? What is that?'
- 'The big 2000.
441637 444230 'Out with the old, in with the new.
444276 446745 'For the man, no news good news.

446797 450584 'Keep it the way it is, but we're
gonna take it and make it new.

450637 453629 - 'History's gonna start right here.'
- 'Dewayne...'
453677 455793 'I wanna give a shout to, uh...'

455836 458908 (DJ) 'You're on the air, Lori.'
'If you read the Bible,

458956 461709 'you'd know there won't be
another thousand years.

461757 464350 - 'We're in the last days...'
'The last days?

464396 467149 'You mean the apocalypse,
the rapture?'

467197 470427 'Look at the signs.
There are wars, rumours of wars...'

470476 473149 'Just so we know how much time
is left,
473197 475870 'when is the rapture supposed to hit?

475916 478908 - 'Is it midnight, New Year's Eve?'
- 'That's right.'

478956 483108 'Is that midnight LA time
or Eastern Standard Time or what?

483156 485716 - 'What time zone is God in?'
- 'I pray for you all.'
500476 501956 Ooh, yeah. Oh, yeah!
501997 503987 (Lenny) OK. I can use this.

504036 508348 It's not bad but honey,
move your eyes slower next time.

508396 511706 Much slower, like you're making love
with your eyes, OK?
520956 523231 (Man) Let me get this straight.

523277 526586 You'll pay me $200 to put on a
hairnet and bang some beautiful babe?
526636 528628 I got to think about this.
528677 530474 Let's wire you up.

530517 534270 I hope this grease on your hair
doesn't screw up the squid receptors.
534317 537389 What is all this squid shit, anyway?

537437 541270 Superconducting quantum
interference device. Squid.

541317 545071 The receptor rig on your head
sends a signal to the recorder.

545116 547950 We call it being wired,
but there's no wire.

547996 551273 Keep the recorder
five, six feet away max,

551317 554831 in your jacket, by the bed,
wherever you're gonna close escrow.

554876 556868 - Know what I mean?
- Yeah, right.

556917 560830 You got a half-hour of tape so give
me some lead-in, but not too long.

560876 563311 - I ain't going out for popcorn.
- Don't worry.

563356 564870 - Got it?
- No problem.

564917 568033 You look great. You look...
You look beautiful.
572756 575145 (Screams) Shit!

620996 624114 (Woman, on radio)
'Do you request backup?'
624157 626830 Uh, that's a negative.
626876 630711 Suspect is a black male, 35 to 40...
631756 634032 We're handling it.

662956 664868 - Freeze!
- You bitch!
718996 721067 (Helicopter overhead)

728836 731988 'Hi. It's Lenny.
Just what do you have in mind?'
735876 738674 God damn it, you gotta be there.

738716 742106 You got to help me.
Lenny, please pick up the phone.
743677 745668 Come on, pick up.

745716 749596 Come on, Lenny,
fuckin' pick up the phone!
749636 752833 'OK, I'll call you back.'
827756 830509 Watch what I do. You OK?
831797 834311 You're doin' good, honey.
841636 844275 (Lenny) You look so good!

852076 854510 - Faith, come back.
- You all right?
854557 856673 Do you need help?
856716 859072 Sweetie, you're doing good.
871557 873990 I'm sorry, baby. Are you OK?
895317 898115 (# Bob Marley: "Three Little Birds")
910876 912673 # About a thing
914517 916633 # Cos every little thing
916677 918668 # Gonna be all right... #

918716 921549 - How do you feel?
- (Lenny) Lucky.
927317 929307 # Cos every little thing
929356 931347 # Gonna be all right
932797 934673 # Woke up this mornin'... #
934716 937105 You wanna watch, or you gonna do?
937157 938953 Watch and see.
938996 940988 # Three little birds
942116 944187 # By my doorstep
945076 947351 # Singin' sweet thoughts
948397 950626 # Never as pure as you
952716 955389 # This is my message to you...

965557 968355 # ..every little thing
gonna be all right
969956 971754 # Baby, don't worry
973236 975227 # About a thing
976836 978827 # Cos every little thing
978876 980868 # Gonna be all right... #
983917 987352 Oh, baby, baby, baby...
989037 991346 (Lenny) You're so beautiful.
991397 993785 I love your eyes, Lenny.
995236 997227 I love the way they see.
1001116 1006429 # Sayin', this is my message to you
1010277 1012107 # About a thing
1012956 1015835 # Cos every little thing
1015876 1018027 # Gonna be all right
1019716 1021707 # Baby, don't worry
1022756 1024748 # About a thing
1025676 1027667 # Cos every little thing... #
1029717 1031708 (Sirens outside)

1055957 1058311 'It's being called
the party of the century,

1058356 1060551 'but it may be
the biggest party ever.

1060596 1065352 'No one's seen such preparations,
but they require care and insurance,

1065396 1069674 'and the LAPD is one insurance
company that doesn't want accidents.'

1072076 1074307 # Put you on a reservation
Black nation

1074356 1076665 # Die under your step
and fetch a military lie... #

1076717 1080073 'The bodies of two men
found under the Hollywood Freeway

1080116 1082471 'have been identified
as rap star Jeriko One

1082517 1086145 'and band member James Polton,
known to fans as Replay.

1086196 1090906 'Both were shot in what police are
calling an execution-style killing.
1090957 1092948 'The body of an unidentified woman

1092997 1095590 'was found with them,
also shot numerous times.

1095636 1098434 'Police said the killings
appear to be gang-related.
1098477 1100865 'With his band, Prophets of Light,

1100916 1105865 'Jeriko One's politics and lyrics
have stirred nation-wide controversy.

1105916 1108226 'Meanwhile,
astrologers have been busy

1108277 1110871 'making predictions
for the coming century.

1110916 1113714 'Some of their fortune-telling
is incredible...

1113757 1117032 'Muammar Qaddafi will be awarded
the Nobel Peace Prize.

1117076 1119385 'Turkey will make
reparations to Armenia.

1119436 1122348 'By 2025, there will be
a second woman president...'

1131717 1135756 (Man) Hey, Lenny...
(Woman) How you doin', man?

1143196 1146507 Lenny. Lenny Nero.
We spoke on the phone.

1152517 1156112 Not to be rude, Keith,
but I got to ask. Are you a cop?
1156156 1158307 I understand. No, I'm not.

1158356 1161348 You understand. Attorney, right?
Attorney?

1161396 1163705 - Right?
- That's right.

1163757 1167271 Tassel shoes! Entertainment law
would be my guess.

1167317 1172071 It's my job to know people and what
they want, what's behind their eyes.

1172116 1175711 OK, so tell me, have you...
have you ever jacked in?
1175757 1177873 Have you ever wire-tripped?

1180596 1183873 A virgin brain? Good.
Well, we'll start you off right.

1183916 1186750 Save us some time.
Tell me what you know.

1186797 1190869 Just what I've read, that the
technology was developed for the Feds
1190916 1192907 to replace the body wire,
1192957 1195675 and now it's gone black market.

1197757 1200112 This conversation's
not taking place, OK?

1200156 1202590 - You're damn right.
- Good, good.
1202636 1205515 So do I get the deck from you?

1205557 1208195 I'll get one at cost.
My thing's the software.

1208237 1211912 - Clips, right?
- Clips. Right.

1211957 1216428 Listen, I want you to know
what we're talking about here, OK?
1216477 1219513 This is not "like TV only better."
1219557 1221945 This is life.
1221997 1224557 It's a piece of somebody's life.
1224596 1226553 It's pure and uncut,
1226596 1228587 straight from the cerebral cortex.

1228636 1232630 You're there. You're doing it.
You're seeing it. You're hearing it.
1232676 1234667 You're feeling it.
1234717 1238073 What kind of things...exactly?

1238116 1240471 Exactly anything.
Whatever you want, OK?

1240517 1243667 Want to go skiing without
leaving your den, you can,

1243717 1248107 but I'm assuming a guy like you, you
wanna go skiing, you'd fly to Aspen.

1248156 1251467 That's not what
you're interested in. It's, uh...

1252916 1256910 It's about the stuff that you can't
have, right? The forbidden fruit.

1258396 1261194 Like running into a liquor store
with a .357 Magnum,

1261237 1265150 feeling the adrenaline
pumping through your veins, huh?

1265196 1268553 Or...see that guy with the drop-dead
Filipino girlfriend?

1268596 1273717 Wouldn't you like to be that guy
for 20 minutes, the right 20 minutes?

1275156 1278547 I can make it happen and you won't
even tarnish your wedding ring.

1281196 1285190 - Sounds good.
- See, I can get you what you want.

1285237 1287704 I can get you anything.
Just talk to me.

1287757 1290669 You have to trust me,
cos I'm your priest.
1290717 1292708 I'm... I'm your shrink.

1292757 1296750 I am your main connection to the,
uh...switchboard of souls.

1298876 1302950 I'm the magic man.
Santa Claus of the subconscious.

1302997 1306193 You say it, you think it,
you can have it.

1308477 1311469 You want a girl?
You want two girls?

1312517 1316066 I don't know what your thing is,
what you're curious about.
1316116 1318311 You want a guy?
1318916 1321635 Maybe you want to be a girl. Hey...
1321676 1323712 Think of that. Be a girl.

1323757 1327590 See what that feels like.
Maybe you want a nun to tie you up.
1327636 1329627 It's all doable.
1330156 1332147 Talk to me about costs.

1332196 1336667 Before we get to numbers, I want you
to try a taste. I got a deck with me.

1336717 1339674 - Right here?
- Step into my office.

1374517 1378226 You were just an 18-year-old girl
taking a shower.

1378277 1381394 You're beginning to see
the possibilities here?
1420477 1423309 Hey. So, where is he?
1423356 1426154 He's in the back, making a deal.

1426477 1428672 Next time, let's meet
someplace private.

1428717 1431310 Cops have more to worry about
than the squid trade.

1431356 1435713 Oh, yeah? Assume the position,
you miserable techno-perv puke.
1435757 1437951 Beat it, fuckwad!

1437997 1441114 Max, I was with a client.
You think that's funny?

1442997 1446875 See that preppy puke's face?
Pissed all over his topsiders!

1446916 1449589 OK, it was funny,
but it could cost me money.

1449636 1453755 Come on, amigo. No one knows
how to work them like you do.

1453797 1457311 You could sell a rat's asshole
for a wedding ring.

1458836 1462671 - Let me buy you a drink. Bobby!
- Bobby!

1464356 1468349 Tequila, por favor. Double shots.
Make it a Tres Generaciones.
1468396 1470387 Nothing but the best for Lenny,

1470436 1473315 the finest cop to ever get
thrown off the vice squad.

1473356 1475665 - Fuck you.
- (Laughs)
1476676 1479509 Yeah. Nice tie.

1479557 1482946 - Thanks, Max.
- You dress like a fucking pimp.

1482997 1486193 - It cost more than your wardrobe.
- That's not saying much.

1486237 1489229 It's the one thing that stands
between me and the jungle.

1489277 1494476 The jungle, where some bird can cap
you in the head and ruin your day.

1494517 1497634 - You were lucky, Max.
- So darn lucky...

1497676 1503512 I wake up with a .22 in my brain and
a cop pension I can't live off of.

1503557 1506548 Damn! It's a good thing
I wasn't luckier.
1507676 1509554 Bobby, hit me again.

1509596 1512236 - You seen Faith lately?
- No, she won't call me.
1512277 1514074 It's just as well.

1514116 1519031 Sure, Faith was the best woman you
could ever hope to get, and it's...

1519076 1522955 humiliating that she's gone,
but you got to face that it's over.

1522997 1526386 Thanks, chaplain.
I'm touched by your concern.
1526436 1528997 I just hate to see you pining away.

1529037 1531914 You're my friend.
It makes me want to vomit.

1534436 1537906 - Hey, Iris. You OK?
- I got to talk to you.

1537957 1540675 What happened?
Some john get rough on you?
1540717 1543151 No. Can we talk in private? Please?
1543196 1546154 I'm in trouble. So is Faith.

1546196 1549711 - There's the magic fucking word.
- Come with me to your car.

1549757 1552634 - There's something you have to see.
- What's going on?
1552676 1555349 It's a bad situation.

1555396 1558991 - What?
- If they get me, I know they'll...
1567676 1569667 Hang on! That's my car!
1569717 1572435 Not any more. It belongs to the bank.
1572477 1574468 Hey, wait a second.

1576557 1581346 Two million years of human evolution,
that's the best you can come up with.

1581396 1584230 What do you get to repo a car?
200? 250?
1584277 1586665 I'll pay you 350 right now.

1586717 1589709 - You got the cash?
- I was gonna write you a cheque.

1589757 1593750 - See ya.
- I respect that. I would want cash.

1593797 1597949 They'll take my cheque inside.
Just give me two minutes.

1597997 1600829 Here. You can keep
my watch for collateral.

1603916 1607432 I'll be right back. Two minutes.
Two minutes?
1610676 1612712 Son of a bitch!
1624557 1627230 What happened to your car this time?

1627277 1632031 See, Lenny, if you packed your piece,
you could make the guy see sense.
1632676 1634712 Bobby, turn this up.

1634757 1639272 # You watch us take it all
then you'll understand our pain

1639317 1643151 # We'll make you the rat
that crawled through the cracks
1643196 1645074 # You love that red, white, and blue

1645116 1647914 # But you hate the black,
black, black

1649477 1652388 # And you try to make me think
I did this to myself

1652436 1656907 # When the drugs I smoke and the
guns I tote both came from your shelf
1662196 1664757 # I never had a dream, cos
1666557 1668751 # My life is a nightmare

1669717 1673186 # America's been my bogeyman
for 400 years #
1676757 1678951 'Are you asking me how I feel? '
1678997 1681954 'We felt Jeriko. We listened to him!'
1681997 1686036 'The LAPD is a military force
1686076 1689307 'turned against its own people.
1689356 1691711 'We live in a police state...'

1695076 1698625 '..with their social programmes
that don't work.'

1700277 1704349 'They're rearranging deck chairs
on the Titanic.
1704396 1707036 'But a new day is coming.
1711237 1714547 'The day of reckoning is upon us.

1714596 1719432 'History ends
and begins again...
1719477 1722388 'right here...right now.'
1722436 1725792 Right on! To the end of all things.

1725836 1728431 You know how I know
it's the end of the world?

1728477 1731866 - No. Tell me.
- Everything's already been done.

1731916 1736512 Every kind of music's been tried,
every government's been tried,

1736557 1739628 every fucking hairstyle,
bubble gum flavours,
1739676 1741986 you know, breakfast cereal.

1742037 1746747 What are we going to do? How are we
going to make another thousand years?

1746797 1750425 I'm telling you, man, it's over.
We used it all up.

1750477 1753673 - So, what's this week's sad story?
- They jerked my wheels.

1753717 1757425 It's outrageous the computer errors
the banks make. Have you noticed?

1757477 1760434 No, I haven't,
because I make my payments.

1760477 1763115 So, Max Peltier,
how's the PI business?

1763156 1765590 Sucks. But when I get
this new logo...
1765636 1767752 I want to hear this scumbag.

1767797 1770913 - 'Do you have any leads?'
- 'Was there adequate security?'

1770957 1776111 'There was adequate security
available. He chose not to have it.'

1776156 1779229 - Why is he a scumbag?
- You-know-who left Lenny for him.

1779277 1781996 - Faith left Lenny for him?
- Don't say Faith.

1782037 1786428 You use the "F" word around Lenny,
you got to tranquillise him.
1787957 1789913 'I know I've lost a friend.

1789957 1794872 'A man of great courage, which is
more than I can say for most of us.'

1794916 1797226 - If you're riding...
- OK, let's go.
1800676 1802667 Fuck you, you pig!
1805717 1807708 (Macey) Driving Mr Lenny.

1807757 1811590 It's gonna be a big night.
Feel the energy in the air.

1811636 1813991 There's money to be made,
dreams to sell.

1814037 1816675 - Sleaze to peddle.
- That is so unenlightened.
1816717 1818708 I sell experiences.

1818757 1821953 The way I see it, I'm performing
a humanitarian service.

1821997 1825307 - I probably save lives.
- I don't want to hear this.

1825356 1829873 Everybody needs to walk to the dark
end of the street sometimes.

1829916 1833511 The risks... The streets are
a war zone. Sex can kill you.
1833557 1835354 Slip on the 'trodes,

1835396 1839628 get what you need almost as good as
the real thing and a lot safer.

1839676 1843271 Porno. Face it, you sell porno
to wireheads.
1843317 1844989 Harsh. Harsh and untrue.

1845037 1848108 My clients are professionals.
Some are even celebrities.

1848156 1851148 - What celebrities?
- The guy from the news.

1851196 1853994 - He does the weather.
- That counts.

1854037 1857153 - Hey, you passed La Cienega.
- I'm not taking La Cienega.
1857196 1859586 It's the quickest way to the club.

1859636 1862151 I've got business there.
I'm meeting people.
1862196 1863549 Mace, you're my friend.

1863596 1866509 I'll give you 25%
of what I make tonight.

1866557 1870868 This may be hard for you, but friends
don't have to pay their friends.

1870916 1874114 - Faith's singing there tonight.
- I should have known.

1875156 1879355 Look, I've pulled 12 hours.
I got to get some sleep.
1879396 1882194 I got a pick-up at the St James Club.

1882237 1885433 You can catch a cab. It'll take you
wherever you wanna go.
1885477 1888866 A taxi? Well, someone might see me.

1888916 1893911 (Cop) Hold it right there, ma'am.
Whoa. Hold it right there.
